Pre-Game Insights: Ben Lively and the Guardians take on the Rays at Progressive Field.
The game is scheduled to start at 1:40 p.m. ET and will be broadcast on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, WARF 1350 AM (Spanish) and the Guardians Radio Network.
The starting pitchers are RHP Ben Lively (11-9, 4.01) for the Guardians and RHP Taj Bradley (6-10, 4.40) for the Rays.
